text: Anna Kay Faris (born November 29, 1976) is an American movie, television, stage, voice actress, comedian and singer who is known for her roles in all four Scary Movies, Lost in Translation, Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs, The House Bunny and Overboard. Faris was born on November 29, 1976 in Baltimore, Maryland. She was raised in Edmonds, Washington. She studied at Edmonds- Woodway High School and at the University of Washington. She was married to Ben Indra from 2004 until they divorced in 2008. She was married to Chris Pratt from 2009 to 2018. She has a son, Jack Pratt by her second husband Chris Pratt. In 2017, Faris and Pratt legally separated and divorced the following year. In 2021, she married Michael Barrett. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Baltimore Category:Actors from Washington (state) Category:American movie actors Category:Singers from Baltimore Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from Baltimore Category:Comedians from Washington (state) Category:Singers from Maryland Category:Singers from Washington (state)
title: Anna Faris
